short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show a list comments hidden in pages by programmers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Dark Secrets" is an extension that lets you visualize what should stay hidden in HTML pages.
Developers often leave comments in the code of pages, sometimes intentionally, other times by error.
You can find funny comments in code, or useful info to better understand how a site is built and by who.

With "Dark Secrets" you can also easily copy all comments found in a page into the clipboard.
Comment section can be resized just by dragging the upper edge with your mouse, and closed when not necessary.

Pin this extension and click on its icon to easily enable and disable it in pages!

Happy discovering with "Dark Secrets"!!


If you like this extension, please donate me some bucks via Paypal! Very appreciated! (pin extension to see donation button)
